title: Revue
description: Josh Adams is Australia’s hottest male revue performer. He thrives on the limelight, the stage, and, most of all, the attention of women who endlessly throw themselves at him. He dances sex, speaks sex, breathes sex, is sex. Josh is a bully who lives for a one-night-stand.I don’t.I’m simply here to take his picture. Nothing more, nothing less.Ha!
author: K.M. Golland
